attributes.action: put more army cadet forces into schools and bring some army training into the curriculam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that I gained most of my respect and dicipline from my time in the cadet force and the TA, Im confident that it will teach alot of youngsters respect and teamwork, you only have to look at the success of bad lads tv programme which took on the some of the countries criminals and turned them into decent people. We just assume that kids know all about respect, ettiqutte and dicipline but they dont, parents dont teach or preach these things like they used to and as generations pass soon respect will be almost gone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
